abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance by Escher String Quartet, presented by Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center at Rose Studio.
lead_paragraph: At the Rose Studio, an evening of emotive works with a stirring history behind them.

headline.main: Review: Escher Players Explore Less Familiar Ground: Zemlinsky’s Quartets
headline.print_headline: Scores Responding to Love, Death and Betrayal
